signatures.title: Minimal Modern
signatures.description: Clean single-line signature with name, title and one link. Perfect for startups and freelancers.

signatures.title: Corporate Professional
signatures.description: Classic layout with logo, contact details and social links. Ideal for established brands.

signatures.title: Bold Color Block
signatures.description: Signature with a strong accent bar and clear hierarchy. Great for creative agencies.

signatures.title: Two-Column Contact
signatures.description: Name and title on the left, contact details on the right. Suits sales and support roles.

signatures.title: Social First
signatures.description: Prominent social icons with minimal text. Best for influencers and community managers.

signatures.title: Nonprofit & Warm
signatures.description: Friendly tone with optional logo and clear call-to-action. Fits NGOs and charities.
